mav_sim.chap7.sensor_viewer module¶

Similar to the data viewer from chapter 4, this module provides functionality for viewing the sensors

class mav_sim.chap7.sensor_viewer.SensorViewer¶

Bases: object

Plotting capabilities for viewing the sensor data.

update(sensors: MsgSensors, ts: float) → None¶

Update each of the plots

Parameters:

  • sensors – Sensory data

  • ts – Time step
